text: Yury Ivanov (born 9 July 1952) is a Soviet ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1980 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Soviet Union Category:Ski jumpers at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:People from Sortavala
title: Yury Ivanov (ski jumper)
